original_text: “As for what you see here, the time will come when not one stone will be left on another; every one of them will be thrown down.”
korean_text: 너희 보는 이것들이 날이 이르면 돌 하나도 돌 위에 남지 않고 다 무너뜨려지리라

sentences.original_text: As for what you see here
when not one stone will be left on another
sentences.korean_translation: 돌 위에 돌 하나도 남지 않을 때가

sentences.original_text: every one of them will be thrown down
